title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 220.11 - Retail scales
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 220.11 - Retail scales

State Regulations

Scales used in the retail sale of the commodities listed
below shall be graduated in the units listed and shall have displayed scale
divisions equal to or smaller than the maximum division size. If the device is
marked with a class designation, the scale shall be of the class listed. Maximum
